marketing_blurb: Hi, Spring fans! I'm so looking forward to speaking at this year's RedisDays event on March 23rd!
I am so excited to be a speaker at [Oracle's forthcoming DevLive event. Register now](https://developer.oracle.com/developer-live/java-innovations-mar-2022/)
I'll be doing a keynote for this year's Voxxed Days Bucharest event!
I'll be in Hawaii so this willl be the night before, in essence
I'm so looking forward to returning to Atlanta, GA for the Devnexus show, one of the last big shows I did right before the virus descended.
I'm so looking forward to presenting at the recently formed Arabic JUG online show!

event: Philly Emerging Technologies for the Enterprise (ETE)
marketing_blurb: I'm looking forward to speaking at the Philly ETE show once again!
Microsoft JDConf - Java dev conference is happening May 4/5! Virtual, free, and open to all. An amazing lineup of speakers and topics from around the world. Mark your calendars now - aka.ms/JDConf
I'm so looking forward to speaking at the Arab JUG 5/5/2022 on "Kubernetes Native Java". Join us!
I'll be looking at Spring.next at Devoxx UK, my first time in London since the plague!

I'm so looking forward to returning to bella Barcelona, Spain for the never-to-be-missed Spring I/O event where I'll be talking about Kubernetes Native Java and, with my copresenter Tiffany Jernigan, looking at how to build Kubernetes Operators with Spring Boot. Los vemos pronto!
I'll be at the upcoming SpringOne Tour Toronto installment on June 8th, 2022, and I so look forward to seeing you there!
I'll be at the upcoming JNation show in Lisbon, Portugal! My first time at the show in-person!
I'll be speaking at the upcoming We Are Developers show in Berlin, Germany, starting June 15th, 2022, and I can't wait to see you!
I'm so looking forward to presenting at the (virtual) Korean Spring Meetup in June, 2022

event: nate schutta on a bootiful podcast

marketing_blurb: I'm so looking forward to being at the SpringOne Tour New York 2022 event! It's been so long since I've been to the big apple and I can't wait to return!
I'll be speaking at JBCNConf (live, in Barcelona, Spain, on 18-20 July, 2022)! Nos vemos!
